Uses of Package
org.apache.commons.math4.analysis.integration.gauss

  • Packages that use org.apache.commons.math4.analysis.integration.gauss 
    Package Description
    org.apache.commons.math4.analysis.integration.gauss
    Gauss family of quadrature schemes.
  • Classes in org.apache.commons.math4.analysis.integration.gauss used by org.apache.commons.math4.analysis.integration.gauss 
    Class and Description
    BaseRuleFactory
    Base class for rules that determines the integration nodes and their weights.
    GaussianQuadratureAbstractTest
    Base class for standard testing of Gaussian quadrature rules, which are exact for polynomials up to a certain degree.
    GaussIntegrator
    Class that implements the Gaussian rule for integrating a weighted function.
    SymmetricGaussIntegrator
    This class's implements integrate method assuming that the integral is symmetric about 0.
